Title: Snow Queen
Writer: Vladlen Barbe, Donald Roman Lopez (english adaptation), Tim Richards, Vadim Sveshnikov
Actors: Anna Shurochkina, Ivan Okhlobystin, Galina Tyunina, Dmitriy Nagiev
Plot: The Snow Queen created the world of eternal winter where the polar wind cools human souls and clearness of lines obscure emotions. A girl named Gerda, her pet ferret Luta, and Orm the troll must save her brother Kai and the world.
